Description:
Position Title:              WaiterEmployment Type:      Full TimeSalary:                         up to 4.3K AED, depending on experience and qualifications plus tipsJob Location:             Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:An international French fine dining restaurant in Abu Dhabi Job Description:Greet and seat guests courteously and promptly
Present menus, take orders, and relay them accurately to the kitchen
Serve food and beverages attentively and efficiently
Address guest inquiries and accommodate special requests
Ensure clean and organized tables, providing a pleasant dining environmentSkills
Skills:
Male, 38 years old and below
At least 2 years of experience in related role
Fine dining restaurant experience is a must
Immediate joiners or with maximum 1 month notice will be prioritized
